name: Task Canary
description: Task Canary (previously QuackList) is a personal project admitted into the Sydney Genesis Startup Program, currently in early development which allows for automatic task scheduling and prioritisation.
technologies: Digital Ocean Server w/Docker & Dokku + managed Postgres SQL

name: Tony Morton Photography
description: A photography site built as a personal portfolio. Fully mobile responsive, automatic image compression & watermarks, categories, pagination and administration area built on a custom CMS.
technologies: Digital Ocean Apache2 Server w/Postgres SQL

name: Facebook Hackathon Project
